verses.verse: And in that day <S%H3117><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> women <S%H802><s%> shall take hold <S%H2388><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, We will eat <S%H398><s%> our own bread <S%H3899><s%>, and wear <S%H3847><s%> our own apparel <S%H8071><s%>: only let us be called <S%H7121><s%> by thy name <S%H8034><s%>, to take away <S%H622><s%> our reproach <S%H2781><s%>. let: Heb. let thy name be called upon us to take: or, take thou away

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall the branch <S%H6780><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be beautiful <S%H6643><s%> and glorious <S%H3519><s%>, and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall be excellent <S%H1347><s%> and comely for <S%H8597><s%> them that are escaped <S%H6413><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>. beautiful: Heb. beauty and glory them: Heb. the escaping

And it shall come to pass, that he that is left <S%H7604><s%> in Zion <S%H6726><s%>, and he that remaineth <S%H3498><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, shall be called <S%H559><s%> holy <S%H6918><s%>, even every one that is written <S%H3789><s%> among the living <S%H2416><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: among: or, to life

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will create <S%H1254><s%> upon every dwelling place <S%H4349><s%> of mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%>, and upon her assemblies <S%H4744><s%>, a cloud <S%H6051><s%> and smoke <S%H6227><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%>, and the shining <S%H5051><s%> of a flaming <S%H3852><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>: for upon all the glory <S%H3519><s%> shall be a defence <S%H2646><s%>. upon all: or, above all defence: Heb. covering

And there shall be a tabernacle <S%H5521><s%> for a shadow <S%H6738><s%> in the daytime <S%H3119><s%> from the heat <S%H2721><s%>, and for a place of refuge <S%H4268><s%>, and for a covert <S%H4563><s%> from storm <S%H2230><s%> and from rain <S%H4306><s%>.
